title: Server issues while playing with Riot Toxichawk
body: Was just in a game with Riot Toxichawk. Got DC'd couldnt get back in. I better get my loss Prevented {{champion:48}}. That was an easy win as well :/

replies.body: There was an ISP related issue that occurred earlier. From what I have read Optus users are mainly affected but it could be affecting others that are using their hardware/routing.
So what can we do at the moment because I'm with Optus and I cannot login...I've tried a million times. SIGH
It'll only make me more sad knowing that I can't play :/

> Ill just leave this here.

wooo you cutie you.
Many people are having trouble connecting to league. Only affects some locations...  Friend logged in for me in another state & it worked. Know anything about it?

Rito now it's coming up with:
The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is
not related to the League of Legends server.  See our current Service 
Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com
If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge 
Base article support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Connection-
Failure-Error-When-Logging-In
Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at
support.leagueoflegends.com
Please fix this Rito I just want to play some games :(
Rito I can't play every time I try to log in it doesn't log me in. Why is it that Optus users are always the ones that get affected most by your server issues. Please fix it.
